title: Daft Punk "Get Lucky" help me ID this .....
content:
I'm looking o ID the "Get Lucky" type from Daft Punks artwork. It looks maybe custom but what would be a close match? Also what font is Daft Punk written in?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [daft-punk-get-lucky-remix.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823101307/http:/typophile.com/files/daft-punk-get-lucky-remix.jpg) | 71.81 KB |
author: nicolasrandall

comments.content: Definitely handwritten. Have a look to [Robert Arnow's work](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823101307/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Robert_Arnow) is worth of interest (Mustang, Streetbrush...).
